abstract: One man is killed and two others are injured in shooting in Brooklyn; police have yet to release victims' names and motive for shooting.
lead_paragraph: A shooting on Thursday night in the Brownsville section of Brooklyn left one man dead and two others hospitalized in stable condition, the police said.

headline.main: Man Killed in a Shooting in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Man Killed in a Shooting in Brooklyn
